card_desc: No sir, that's not a directional Wi-Fi antenna on my car. I'm not going to join your wireless network from the parking lot. I'm just listening to the radio and eating a sandwich.
It may have been expensive at the time, but if every time you sit back in your new hot tub and admire the stars, creative inspiration strikes.
Time to upgrade your hardware lab. You buy a new bench, better lighting, and an ergonomic chair.
Sleight of hand, distractions, bluffs, fakes-magic has a lot to teach about misdirection to con people.
Your friend may be staying at your place free of charge, but his experience working ar the NSA sure comes in handy.
Pick gun, bump key, impression kit...hook, half diamond, and snake rake picks...who knew that there were so many types of lockpicking tools?
